Package library.graphics2D

Class Sprite

java.lang.Object
library.graphics2D.Sprite
Direct Known Subclasses:
ColoredSprite, ImageSprite
public abstract class Sprite extends Object
The default sprite class for representing objects in 2d space

    • update

      public void update(float deltaTime)
      Called every frame To ensure proper behavior, any overriding methods should call super.update(dt cbnm,) at the very beginning
      Parameters:
      deltaTime - the time elapsed (in seconds) between the last frame and the one before

    • handleCollision

      public boolean handleCollision(Sprite other)
      Handles the collision between this sprite and another
      Parameters:
      other - the sprite colliding with this one
      Returns:
      true if the collision was handled, false if it was not

    • setClickThroughEnabled

      public void setClickThroughEnabled(boolean cte)
      Determines if click events should pass through the current object and be given to sprites behind this one
      Parameters:
      cte - true if click events should continue to sprites behind this one, false if they should not

    • getClickThroughEnabled

      public boolean getClickThroughEnabled()
      Determines if click events should pass through the current object and be given to sprites behind this one
      Returns:
      true if click events will continue to sprites behind this one, false if they do not

    • getX

      public final float getX()
      Gets the x position of the sprite
      The x position is calculated at the center of the sprite
      Returns:
      the x coordinate of the sprite in the world

      Gets the y position of the sprite
